DOC.brief_summary: This research cognitive training address follow question : 1 . Does cognitive training lead improve cognition , functional ability , psychiatric symptom , treatment adherence , quality life patient psychosis ? 2 . What neurocognitive non-cognitive factor predict good outcome follow cognitive rehabilitation ? In addition verbal learn memory , immediate verbal memory , vigilance , executive functioning , cognitive training intervention attempt improve prospective memory ability ( i.e. , ability remember thing future , take medication attend doctor 's appointment ) .
DOC.criteria: Primary psychotic disorder ( include schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , psychotic mood disorder , psychosis NOS ) Age 18 old Fluency English Dementia Neurological condition affect cognition Mental retardation Substance use disorder within past month Participation intervention trial
